reference_details.sylvan_monster: Avatar of Nature, Dragon or Treefather

options.name: Song of Cenyrn
options.description: May be activated when the bearer's unit declares a Charge. The target of the Charge may only declare Hold! as its Charge Reaction, unless it is Shaken. The enemy unit may still declare Charge Reactions as normal if it is subsequently Charged by other units.

options.name: Sacred Seeds
options.description: May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase. Place a Forest Terrain Feature in contact with the bearer and at least 1" away from any enemy units and other Terrain Features. This Forest remains in play until the end of the game (even if the bearer is removed as a casualty), it must fit within a circle of 6" diameter and is considered Dangerous Terrain.

options.name: Oaken Might
options.description: +3 Str.

options.name: Banner of Deception
options.description: Once the opponent has deployed their entire army, but before moving models with Vanguard, the owner may remove the bearer's unit from the Battlefield and deploy it again elsewhere. Attachable models deployed inside the unit must be redeployed inside the same unit.

options.name: Predator Pennant
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Devastating Charge (Distracting (1)).

options.name: Banner of Silent Mist
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Soft Cover. Enemy units within 3" of the bearer's unit may not gain any benefit from their Musician.

options.name: Hunter's Honour
options.description: +1 Str and +1 AP. If the wielder causes at least one unsaved wound with this weapon, the wielder and all Rank-and-File models in its unit gain Distracting (1) until the end of the Round of Combat.

options.name: Watcher's Woe
options.description: Number of Shots is set to at least 3, Poison Attacks (Shooting).

options.name: Bough Of Wyscan
options.description: Number of Shots is always set to 1, Str 3, AP 2, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (2).

options.name: Spirit of the Whirlwind
options.description: +1 Att, +1 Str, and +2 AP.

options.name: Mist Walker's Mirror
options.description:
One use only. May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase if the bearer’s unit is unengaged, consists entirely of Height 1 models, and is fully inside a Forest that is not in contact with enemy models. Apply the following rules:
  • Remove the bearer's unit from the Battlefield.
  • Immediately place it back using Ambush (centre of Forest).
If the unit cannot be placed, it is considered destroyed where it was removed.

options.name: Hail Shot
options.description:
One use only. May be activated in the Shooting Phase. This is a Shooting Weapon with the following profile:
  •
Hail Shot cannot benefit from Forest's Thorns.

options.name: Horn of the Wild Hunt
options.description: One use only. May be activated when a friendly unit within 8" fails a Charge Range roll. The Charge Range roll is rerolled.

options.name: Glyph of Amryl
options.description: The bearer gains +3 Def.

options.name: Shapeshifter
options.description: The model gains Exclusive,Fortitude (4+),Vanguard. Its Mob is set to 10". The model loses Attached (if it has it).

options.name: Wild Hunter
options.description: The model gains Fearless,Frenzy,Light Troops and the model part gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str),Fury,Lethal Strike.

options.name: Pathfinder
options.description:
The model gains Root and Snare (see Pathfinder unit),Forest's Thorns,Scout, Stand and Shoot,Vanguard.
Sylvan Longbow wielded by the model has its Shots set to 4 if a Chieftain, or 5 if a Forest Prince.

options.name: Forest Guardian
options.description: The model gains Vanguard. The model and Rank-and-File models in the model's unit gain First Strike (Hatred).

options.name: Blade Dancer
options.description: The model gains Aegis (6+), Dances of Cenyrn (see Blade Dancer unit),Exclusive (Blade Dancer Kindred, Blade Dancers),Fearless,Magic Resistance (2). The model's unit gains Swiftstride.

options.name: Scarred Bark
options.description: The model's unit gains First Strike (Hatred).

options.name: Toxic Spores
options.description: The model's unit Standard Melee Attacks gain Lethal Strike.

options.name: Entangling Vines
options.description: The model gains Impaling Roots if it didn't have it. When the model is fighting a Duel, enemy Melee Attacks towards it must reroll successful to-hit rolls.

options.name: Oaken Crown
options.description: The model's unit gains Disciplined and Fortitude (5+).

options.name: Verdant Rebirth
options.description: The first time each Magic Phase that the model successfully casts a Learned Spell that targets a friendly unit, it Recovers 1 HP. The model cannot Recover more than 1 HP per Magic Phase from this spell or Fountain of Youth (Druidism).

options.name: Shielding Bark
options.description: +1 HP, Aegis (5+),Fearless, Tree Singing,Weakness (Flaming Attacks). Arm is set to 4 and can never be improved beyond this.

options.name: Bone Break Dancer and Paired Weapons
